title: PS5 About to Outperform PCs? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.13.20
description:
Epic Games came through with the HOTNESS today, so let's talk about the amazing PS5 demo, Fortnite being a next-gen launch title, and SO much more! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:04:00 - Housekeeping
We won the Gamers vs Cancer American Cancer Society Tournament! Thank you for all of your support!
Ghost of Tsushima State of Play tomorrow -- watch live with us! 1 pm PT twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:07:30 - Epic CEO Tim Sweeney says the PS5 is so impressive it’s ‘going to help drive future PCs’ Nick Statt @ The Verge
00:28:10 - As with all tech demos, should we temper our expectations? - Best Friends Q:Midnight Owl
00:40:10 - PS5 On track, PlayStation Plus Killing, Matthew Handrahan @ GIB
00:43:00 - Phil Spencer Says 2021 Games Are More Likely to feel the Pandemic, Mathew Olson @ USG
00:44:50 - Do you think 2021 will be a dry year for video games? - Best Friends Q:TheFinalBossFight
00:51:05 - Fortnite is a PS5, Xbox Series X Launch Game, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:54:15 - Animal Crossing is the best selling Switch game EVER in Japan, James Batchelor
00:56:19 - Square won’t do a showcase this year, Smaller events, Bloomberg’s Takashi Mochizuki
01:02:30 - Out today
01:07:10 - Squad Up: Apex Season 5 - 6:30 pm - twitch.tv/andycortez
01:07:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
